name: Flight delay prediction
desc: Used Python and key libraries like Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib, Seaborn, and scikit-learn to predict flight delays.

name: HealthPro+
desc: Collaborated on a university project to develop a comprehensive diet and fitness planning management website using HTML, CSS, and JS, integrating with Nutrient API

name: Calorie Burnt prediction
desc: Developed a machine learning model using libraries like Sklearn, Seaborn, Pandas, and Numpy to predict calories burnt down during physical activities

name: Analysis of smartphones sales data
desc: Performed data cleaning and manipulation, and exploratory data analysis using pandas, matplotlib, and seaborn libraries.

name: Diabetes Classification
desc: Developed a diabetes classification model using Python, Pandas, scikit-learn's KNeighborsClassifier, and MinMaxScaler.

name: Distance Alert Web App
desc: Developed a web application using Dash framework in Python to monitor the distance between the user and the screen in real-time.
